about_the_game:
Singing karaoke in Discord, playing music in a game... do you get tired of those mixing consoles? Why not try Sumtune? It only takes three steps to set everything up.

Play Music through Your Mic

Sumtune is an application that can mix the input voice with chosen audio sources and play it out in different applications, so your friends can hear it in real-time.

Three Steps to Setup


  • Select the microphone that you are currently using.


  • Choose the application of your audio sources. Some examples are Spotify, Potplayer, and Chrome.


  • Use the Sumtune microphone as your input device in those applications where you want to share the audio.

Notes

When you run Sumtune for the first time, it will install the virtual microphone for you.
